page.title: 12The Local Police cont'd
page.content: In his spare time he helps to look after his yound children and goes clay pigeon shooting. His equipment includes his panda car, enabling him to cover large areas. This is why Cromhall lost its own police station. He carries a truncheon, although he has never hit anyone with it in his ten years with the police. He also has a torch, wellington boots, handcuffs and a radio, which he can use to contact other branches of the police. One such unit is the forensic science unit. Once they helped convict a man charged with hitting another man with a lemonade bottle. Tiny bits of glass were found on the man's clothes. The entire bottle was rebuilt and the missing bits were found to match.
